articles.title: Severe brain damage possible even with mild coronavirus symptoms - Deutsche Welle
articles.description: According to British neurologists, COVID-19 can cause serious damage to the brain and central nervous system. Such damage can lead to psychosis, paralysis and strokes, which are often detected in their late stages.
articles.content: There are numerous signs that the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 not only attacks the lungs and respiratory tract, but also other organs on a massive scale.It can severely affect the heart, vessels, ne… [+7333 chars]
